verses.text: 吩咐門徒等候聖靈提阿非羅先生：我已經寫了前書，敘述耶穌開始所行所教的一切，

words.note: Lit. 'gate follower', one who enters the gate of teaching.
Lit. 'holy spirit'.
Forms a nominal phrase from a verb, e.g., 'that which'.
Forms a nominal phrase from a verb, e.g., 'that which'.
Used to link a modifying element to a noun or nominal phrase.

verses.text: 一直到他藉著聖靈吩咐所揀選的使徒之後，被接上升的日子為止。

words.note: Lit. 'holy spirit'.
Forms a nominal phrase from a verb, e.g., 'that which'.
Used to link a modifying element to a noun or nominal phrase.
Lit. 'sent follower'.
Used to link a modifying element to a noun or nominal phrase.
Often used with '到' (dào) to mean 'until'.

verses.text: 他受難以後，用許多憑據向使徒顯示自己是活著的。他向使徒顯現，並且講論　神的國的事，有四十天之久。

words.note: Refers to Jesus' suffering and passion.
Lit. 'sent follower'.
Used to link a modifying element to a noun or nominal phrase.
Lit. 'sent follower'.
Refers to God. The preceding space is a reverence marker.
Used to indicate possession or a modifying relationship.
Often used in '神的國' (Kingdom of God).
Used to link a modifying element to a noun or nominal phrase.
Indicates duration, 'for (so long) a time'.

verses.text: 耶穌和他們一同吃飯的時候，吩咐他們不要離開耶路撒冷，說：「你們要等候父的應許，就是你們聽我講過的，

words.note: Used to form a nominalizer, here indicating 'when' or 'the time of'.
Refers to God the Father.
Used to indicate possession or a modifying relationship.
Used to link a modifying element to a noun or nominal phrase.

verses.text: 約翰是用水施洗，但再過幾天，你們要受聖靈的洗。」

words.note: Lit. 'perform washing'.
Lit. 'holy spirit'.
Used to indicate possession or a modifying relationship.
Short for 'baptism' (洗禮), here refers to the act or rite.

verses.text: 耶穌升天他們聚集的時候，問耶穌說：「主啊，你要在這時候使以色列復國嗎？」

words.note: Refers specifically to Christ's ascension.
Refers to God or Jesus in a religious context.
Expresses strong emotion or a call.

verses.text: 耶穌說：「父憑著自己的權柄所定的時間或日期，你們不必知道。

words.note: Refers to God the Father.
Often refers to divine or official authority.
Used to form a nominalized clause or passive voice.

verses.text: 可是聖靈降臨在你們身上，你們就必領受能力，並且要在耶路撒冷、猶太全地、撒瑪利亞，直到地極，作我的見證人。」

words.note: Often implies receiving something significant or spiritual.
Literally 'earth's extreme', indicating vast global reach.
A key term in the book of Acts.

verses.text: 說完了這話，他們還在看的時候，他被接上升，有一朵雲把他接去，就看不見他了。

words.note: Used after a verb to indicate successful perception.

verses.text: 當他往上升，他們定睛望天的時候，忽然有兩個人，身穿白衣，站在他們旁邊，

words.note: Literally 'fix eyes', meaning to stare intently.

verses.text: 說：「加利利人哪，為甚麼站著望天呢？這位被接升天離開你們的耶穌，你們看見他怎樣往天上去，他也要怎樣回來。」
選出馬提亞作使徒後來，他們從橄欖山回到耶路撒冷。那山靠近耶路撒冷，有一安息日可走的路程。

words.note: Lit. 'sent disciple'
Lit. 'rest day'

verses.text: 他們進了城，上了一間樓房，就是彼得、約翰、雅各、安得烈、腓力、多馬、巴多羅邁、馬太、亞勒腓的兒子雅各、激進派的西門、雅各的兒子猶大等人所住的。

words.note: Refers to the 'upper room' where disciples gathered.
Refers to the 'Zealot' political group
Indicates the following verb is passive or modifies a preceding noun.

verses.text: 這些人和幾個婦女，耶穌的母親馬利亞，還有他的兄弟們，都在一起，同心地恆切禱告。

words.note: Lit. 'same heart'
Turns preceding adjective into an adverb.
Lit. 'tell by praying'

verses.text: 那時，約有一百二十人聚會，彼得在眾弟兄中間站起來說：

words.note: Refers to male believers in the church.

verses.text: 「弟兄們，經上的話，就是聖靈藉著大衛的口，預言那領人捉拿耶穌的猶大的事，是一定會應驗的。

words.note: A common form of address in the New Testament.
Refers to what is written in the Scriptures.
Lit. 'holy spirit'.

verses.text: 他本是我們中間的一個，一同領受了這職分。
他用不義的酬勞買了一塊田，結果倒頭栽了下去，腹破腸流。

words.note: A directional complement indicating downward movement.
A gruesome idiom describing a fatal injury.

verses.text: 這事住在耶路撒冷的人全都知道，所以按當地的話，那塊地稱為亞革大馬，意思就是『血田』。
因為詩篇上寫著：『願他的住處變為荒場，無人居在其中。』又說：『願別人取代他的職分。』

words.note: Refers to the Book of Psalms.
More formal/literary than '住'.

verses.text: 所以，從約翰施洗起，直到主離開我們被接上升的那天為止，當他在我們中間來往的時候，那些跟我們常在一起的人中，應該有一個人出來與我們一同作耶穌復活的見證人。」

words.note: Verb-object compound: 'bestow baptism'
Indicates a starting point in time
A passive construction meaning 'to be received/taken'
Commonly used for Christ's ascension
Often follows '直到' (zhídào)
Lit. 'return to life'

verses.text: 於是他們提出兩個人：約瑟（號稱巴撒巴，又名猶士都）和馬提亞，
就禱告說：「主啊！你知道萬人的心，求你從這兩個人中，指明你要揀選誰，

words.note: Verb-object compound: 'to speak a prayer'
Lit. 'ten thousand people'; idiomatically 'all people'

verses.text: 來承擔這使徒的職位和工作。這職位猶大已經放棄，往他自己的地方去了。」

words.note: Lit. 'sent disciple'

verses.text: 大家就為他們抽籤，結果抽中了馬提亞，他就與十一使徒同列。

words.note: Verb-object compound: 'draw a lot'

words.definition: be numbered among, join the ranks
words.note: Lit. 'same rank'
